full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` THUN DRUG GI RNAL 'BYOR DANG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB 'DOD 'JO BA DANG 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SHES RAB MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,THUN DRUG GI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL SHIN TU BSDUS PA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES MTHUN DRUG GI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG LA KHA SKONGS CUNG ZAD ZAD SBYAR TE, SNYOM LAS PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
